content.rendered:
24Fashion TV Exclusive: Gh Luxury Lingerie at Los Angeles Fashion Week 2021.

Wraps, straps, layers, and sheer fabric that will get you lots of double-takes anywhere you go, that was the core of the GH Luxury Lifestyle collection. Contrasting colors and fabrics were also on display this day, as were bright Asian-styled printed fabrics turned into full-length dresses. Wow!

Watch the full show for FREE on 24FashionTV channel on ROKU TV or Amazon Fire TV

Photo by Liza Kushnir exclusively for 24Fashion TV

LAFW powered by Art Hearts Fashion
